Jumia Nigeria | Online Shopping for Electronics, Fashion, Home, Beauty & Sport
Anniversary Sale – 50% Off Everything | Up to 50% OFF
Jumia Nigeria - Nigeria's No. 1 Shopping Destination
Shop for Everything You Need on Jumia Nigeria
Jumia Nigeria is the largest online shopping website in Nigeria. We offer a platform where customers in any part of Nigeria can find and shop for all they need in one online store and that platform is the Jumia shopping website. On the Jumia mobile app or website, you can shop from the comfort of your home or during work breaks and get everything delivered fast without you having to stress or move an inch. Be it fashion, electronics, mobile phones, computers, or your everyday groceries you can get everything you need on Jumia online store.
Have you used the Jumia online store today? Shop now on Jumia to enjoy a seamless online shopping experience. With fast delivery, free returns, and flexible payment options, you are certain to enjoy the convenience of shopping online.
Shop for Original and Quality Items at The Best Prices
Jumia Nigeria prides itself in giving the best prices and the best quality of products you can find anywhere in the country. Our strong partnership with top brands like Oraimo, Samsung, Infinix, Xiaomi, Diageo, Tecno, Adidas, Nike, Trendyol, etc. guarantees our customers the cheapest prices on original brand products. Beyond that, customers also have exclusive access to the latest product released by these top brands. If you enjoy exclusivity, the Jumia Official Store is the right place for you. On the Jumia official stores, you can experience product launches and be among the first set of people in Nigeria to own new products. You can also enjoy huge offers on brand days that come with heavy discounts on various products ranging from mobile phones to drinks, clothing items, sneakers, and many more!
Explore our official stores today to see a wide range of popular brands that sell directly on our platform and get assured of the best prices and quality of products you buy on Jumia.
Shop the Latest Fashion and Trendy Outfits Online
Discover an extensive range of fashion items for women, men, and kids on Jumia. Our women's fashion collection includes a diverse selection of clothing such as blouses, pants, and jeans. We also offer a variety of gowns in different lengths and materials to suit your individual style. Additionally, browse through our unique fashion accessories like shoes, bags, jewelry, and sunglasses, all at unbeatable prices.
For men's fashion, Jumia has an impressive collection of stylish clothing pieces that can make a statement. Find quality men's trousers, shoes, shirts, watches and suits at the most affordable prices. Sports enthusiasts can also get their hands on quality gym wear, trendy sneakers, and other sportswear items.
At Jumia, we haven't forgotten about the little ones. Browse through our selection of baby clothes for boys and girls and their accessories. Shop now on Jumia Nigeria and enjoy an incredible online shopping experience.
Indulge in a Selection of Beauty Products
Our online store also offers you the best beauty products from top brands in the world, e.g. Nivea and many others. Many things related to health and beauty e.g. skin care products, makeup and cosmetics, wigs, oral care, hair care, and fragrances can be found at our online store.
Be certain that whatever we sell on the Jumia website is of good quality. When you shop for your beauty products on Jumia you have successfully avoided getting fake products that can cause unhealthy reactions to your skin or body and without breaking the bank, you can maintain a healthy beauty routine to leave jaws dropping.
Get Your Home Needs on Jumia Nigeria
Jumia is an online supermarket where you can shop for your daily groceries in Nigeria at prices cheaper than others. Check off your grocery list and stock up your pantry with a variety of items ranging from rice to cooking oils, wines, Snacks, beverages, household cleaning items, and many others. We also have a section for fresh foods and canned foods. Also, Discover our baby shop for all baby essentials from baby food and diapers to toys and educational games. 
Beyond your daily grocery needs, you can shop on Jumia online for unique home furniture and interior decor pieces to beautify your homes and offices. We have carefully designed outdoor furniture and lighting for your patio and rooftops. We also have generators, inverters, and inverter batteries to power up. There is nothing your home needs that is not on Jumia. You can easily shop from our huge collection of large and small appliances such as fridges, washing machines, air conditioners, iron, blenders, air fryers, and many others. Shop for all your home needs and enjoy top deals, prices, and offers you can get nowhere else.
Buy the Latest Smartphones and Electronics From Jumia Nigeria
Shopping on Jumia guarantees that you get the latest mobile phones, tablets, or phablets before anyone else. Buy trusted Apple iOS iPhones and iPads and quality Android brands like Samsung, Tecno, Xiaomi, Infinix, and many others! Unlock the best functionality of your smartphones when you buy our amazing phone accessories like AirPods, earphones, powerbank, Bluetooth speakers, durable phone cases, and many more! We have an endless supply of Jumia phone accessories from top brands like Oraimo, Edifier, Samsung, Tecno, JBL, etc.
We also have an amazing collection of top computing brands like Hp, Dell, Lenovo, Microsoft, Apple Macbook, and more! You can either buy these computing devices as desktops or laptops depending on your choice. Shop for computing accessories like printers, scanners, computer components, and monitors to enhance your computer or laptop experience. 
Our catalog of electronics offers you the highest quality of products from trusted sellers and brands. You can get the latest smart televisions and home audio devices for your living room. To spice things up, you can get the PlayStation consoles or Xbox consoles especially if you love gaming during your leisure time.
Enjoy Top Deals and Discounts when Shopping on Jumia Nigeria Online Store
There are limitless offers and deals on the Jumia Nigeria online store. Enjoy up to 80% discount on selected items of the day during the flash sales. We also have Half Price Deals where our shoppers buy selected products like mobile phones, laptops, phone accessories, and clothing pieces for half the original price. Get the best prices you can find on the best deals page. 
Enjoy other weekly offers that run all year long, which means that every time you shop on the Jumia website, you are sure to enjoy mouth-watering discounts and deals that will help you save more and get the most affordable prices no one else can give you. To know more about these offers and deals, you can subscribe to our push notifications and newsletters, read our blog, and follow us on all our social media accounts.
Experience Fast Delivery and Online Shopping Convenience
Get your cart delivered to you within 24 hrs when you buy items with the Jumia Express tag, for selected products, you are also assured of free delivery and have your products delivered to you at no extra cost! Also, we have products that you can ship from abroad under the Jumia Global catalog. This means that you can order various items from outside the country and get them delivered to your doorstep without hassles. 
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
What Payment Options are Available on Jumia?
You can either pay online or pay on delivery when you shop from us. With out payment solution called JumiaPay, you can conveniently pay online or on delivery with your cards (MasterCard, Visa and Verve), bank transfers and USSD. 
Can I Return the Items I Bought From Jumia?
Yes, you can return items you bought for free and get refunded as soon as possible! We have a refund policy that grants you 7 days to return ALL eligible items bought from the official store and other sellers on Jumia Nigeria.
When is the Next Jumia Black Friday?
Jumia Black Friday happens in November. Jumia is the pioneer of Black Friday in Nigeria, so expect us to do it best! It comes with the biggest discount and offers on various categories of products like fashion, phones, computers, home appliances, electronics and many more! We also have various exciting and engaging activities like the treasure hunt and games our customers love to play.
Can I get Free Delivery on All my Orders?
Customers in Lagos, Abuja, Ibadan,Warri,Benin, Abeokuta, Akure and Portharcourt enjoy free delivery on items with the free delivery tag. Free delivery does not apply to large items like refrigerators, huge TVs, washing machines and others.
What Is the Jumia Customer Care Line?
We have a dedicated team that is always available to make sure your shopping experience on Jumia is effortless. Simply dial 02018881106 to reach out to us for complaints and other inquiries. If you would like to place an order, please call us at 0700-600-0000. You can also chat with us on the Jumia app if you find that more convenient. Whatever you do, we are always available to help.
How Can I Become a Seller on Jumia?
You can partner with Jumia as a seller on the website. All you need to do is register and follow the necessary steps. With our large customer base, we can help you reach a wider audience and sell many of your products to our customers
What Other Events are Celebrated in Jumia?
Aside the Jumia Black Friday, the Jumia Tech Week is another big event we celebrate in Jumia Nigeria. The goal of the Jumia Tech Week is to help customers have access to the latest technology at the cheapest prices they can get. It happens in the month of March of every year and lasts at least two weeks. 
Aside these major events, we also have Ramadan sales, Easter sales, Christmas sales and other seasonal celebrations we make sure our customers enjoy on Jumia. 
Shop now and enjoy unlimited offers, discounts and the best online shopping experience!

# Ironing and Pressing - Buy Online | Pay on Delivery

## Want to buy a Steam Iron?

Having a good clothing line and dressing cool is nice but when you have rumpled and rough clothes, you look shabby and untidy in it. Irons are an essential tool in the home because they take care of your clothes and make them fit for wearing. A rumpled shirt for **David wej**, would look really odd on any man, and a squeezed dress from **Wana Sambo** will make any lady look out of place in any gathering or event. A lot of pressing irons are in the market, but why buy what will get your clothes burnt or damaged. Jumia has [quality pressing iron](http://www.jumia.com.ng/binatone-steam-iron-si-2005-58248.html) and ironing board in stock that will get your laundry done with less effort. After finding your perfect look with our classy **[shirts for men](http://www.jumia.com.ng/mens-shirts/)**, you need a high tech, quality iron to take care of it at anytime at all time.

### Irons from Jumia

For a rumpled cotton **David Wej** shirt, a **Philips steam Iron** will make it as smooth as silk making you look smart and professional. The **[dry iron](http://www.jumia.com.ng/dry-irons/)** will take care of your silk and linen dresses giving you that glittery look and spark. Other brands of ironing machine on Jumia are **Panasonic** steam and dry iron and other models from Philips. Jumia is the best place to get industrial laundry **[steam iron](http://www.jumia.com.ng/steam-irons/)** in Nigeria. Online stores are the way of the future for buying your books, phones, electronics, toys and more at the click of a button. Buy premium quality pressing irons online at Jumia at the best price in Nigeria.

text:
Freezers: Buy Deep Freezers Online
Buy Freezers Online in Nigeria
More often times than none, a freezer is one of the electrical appliances that must be found in every home. There are general home appliances and accessories which generally contribute to you having a better stay in your home both for you and for your family. These appliances ensure that you get work done better and faster. Freezers are one of such home appliances and we would recommend that you have them in your home. A fridge or freezer is an appliance which helps to preserve food and fruits as well as drinks by keeping them really cold and frozen till when you eventually need to cook or eat them. Preservation by freezing works by preventing the growth of mould or bacteria on your food. If kept refrigerated, food can stay up to days, weeks and even months without losing their original quality or nutrients.
Advantages of Having A Freezer
Having a freezer in your home is very useful for many reasons some of which are as follows:
They help to store your food and reduce wastage for as long as you want. With constant electricity, there is no better way to preserve your food than to save them in a freezer. With one, you can also reduce the rate at which food is wasted in your home. Living without a freezer means that you cannot afford to cook large portions of food else you stand a chance of wasting food and invariably, money. Food and fruits stored in freezers can also be kept fresh for days and weeks and sometimes, even extending to a month or a couple of months.
They save money and save time: Cooking every day can be stressful, especially if you have other responsibilities like a day job. Having a freezer helps you to find a particular day when you can do all your cooking and save the remaining in it for when you need to cook them. This way, you only have to thaw or warm them when you need them in a couple of days or more without having to go to the market or spend money again on getting food cooked.
Buy Freezers On Jumia Nigeria
Buy freezers online on Jumia Nigeria and give yourself an easier life and a better life in the kitchen. Their level of coolness can also be adjusted to your level of preference especially if you’re storing drinks in bottles in them.

text:
Heaters- Buy Heaters Online On Jumia Nigeria
High-Quality Heaters for Sale at Jumia Nigeria
People pay a great amount of attention when it comes to buying home and living products. Each item is of the utmost importance for you to complete your home. When you think about home appliances, one of the most significant ones are heaters. These devices are absolutely necessary for the winters when the cold becomes unbearable. Different styles and sizes are available to choose from depending on the type of setting. If you want to do some online shopping for heaters, then Jumia is the place for you. We have the largest range available at the best prices to choose from.
Electric vs Gas Heaters
When it comes to heaters, there are two types available. The first one is the electric heater that uses electricity to run and the other one is a gas heater that uses a specific amount of gas to run itself. The Electric heater is known to offer high energy efficiency as it easily heats up a room in a short matter of time. It can be used in closed spaces as it is not harmful to health. Due to its small sizes, it is the best option to use if you want to have a portable heating option. It requires a continuous electrical outlet so should be placed near a power unit. Some of them use electricity as equivalent to an air conditioner. A Gas heater is less expensive as compared to an electric heater. It also offers great portability as the gas pipe can be attached as long as you want. It has the ability to function if power outages occur and you will have continuous heat. Another benefit is that gives heat very quickly. One thing to keep in mind here is that no home décor should be placed near it or it might catch fire.
Types of heaters available
There are a wide range of heaters available and buying any one of these is according to your own requirements. Convection heaters are the most convenient and energy efficient ones out there. These are used to heat large spaces in a short period of time. It stores heat in itself and then distributes it evenly throughout the whole room. Fan-forced Ceramic heaters give out warm air that can be centred towards one specific area. It has self-regulating elements that cut off heat when it gets too warm. These come in a wide range of sizes to meet a number of needs. Radiant heaters are known as reflective heaters that generate heat using infrared rays. These make you feel like you are standing in the sun. This type of heater is best for a small group of people who want to get warm in a quick manner.
Your heater needs to be fulfilled at Jumia
You can find all varieties of heaters at Jumia at the best prices. All you need to do is enter your details and the product will be delivered to your doorstep. Once you receive it, simply pay cash on delivery. Have the best experience shopping at Jumia!

# Heaters- Buy Heaters Online On Jumia Nigeria

## High-Quality Heaters for Sale at Jumia Nigeria

People pay a great amount of attention when it comes to buying home and living products. Each item is of the utmost importance for you to complete your home. When you think about home appliances, one of the most significant ones are heaters. These devices are absolutely necessary for the winters when the cold becomes unbearable. Different styles and sizes are available to choose from depending on the type of setting. If you want to do some online shopping for heaters, then Jumia is the place for you. We have the largest range available at the best prices to choose from.

## Electric vs Gas Heaters

When it comes to heaters, there are two types available. The first one is the electric heater that uses electricity to run and the other one is a gas heater that uses a specific amount of gas to run itself. The Electric heater is known to offer high energy efficiency as it easily heats up a room in a short matter of time. It can be used in closed spaces as it is not harmful to health. Due to its small sizes, it is the best option to use if you want to have a portable heating option. It requires a continuous electrical outlet so should be placed near a power unit. Some of them use electricity as equivalent to an air conditioner. A Gas heater is less expensive as compared to an electric heater. It also offers great portability as the gas pipe can be attached as long as you want. It has the ability to function if power outages occur and you will have continuous heat. Another benefit is that gives heat very quickly. One thing to keep in mind here is that no home décor should be placed near it or it might catch fire.

## Types of heaters available

There are a wide range of heaters available and buying any one of these is according to your own requirements. Convection heaters are the most convenient and energy efficient ones out there. These are used to heat large spaces in a short period of time. It stores heat in itself and then distributes it evenly throughout the whole room. Fan-forced Ceramic heaters give out warm air that can be centred towards one specific area. It has self-regulating elements that cut off heat when it gets too warm. These come in a wide range of sizes to meet a number of needs. Radiant heaters are known as reflective heaters that generate heat using infrared rays. These make you feel like you are standing in the sun. This type of heater is best for a small group of people who want to get warm in a quick manner.

## Your heater needs to be fulfilled at Jumia

You can find all varieties of heaters at Jumia at the best prices. All you need to do is enter your details and the product will be delivered to your doorstep. Once you receive it, simply pay cash on delivery. Have the best experience shopping at Jumia!

Buy Water Dispensers Online in Nigeria
Where to Buy Water Dispensers Online in Nigeria
Water dispensers are mostly made in a freestanding design generally involves bottles of water placed spout-down into the dispensing machine, there is also the wall mounted kind of water dispenser. Table top water dispenser or kitchen worktop versions are available which utilize readily available five litre water bottles. These water coolers use air pumps to push the water into the cooling compartment and Peltier devices to chill the water. A new development is the advent of countertop appliances which are connected to the mains and provide an instant supply of not only chilled water but also hot water. This saves you the stress of filling little bottles with water to get chilled in the refrigerator as the manual water dispenser for home is way more economical and convenient to use. If you are short of space in your home or office, our Mini Water Dispensers are just perfect for you.
Water Dispensers on Jumia
The water dispenser machine is efficiently used with its specially made bottle which comes separately in purchase, just the way it is done on Jumia and it gets delivered to you at your doorstep. How is this water bottle used? the bottle is tipped upside down and set onto the dispenser, a probe punctures the cap of the bottle and allows the water to flow into the machine's internal reservoir. These gravity-powered systems have a device to dispense water in a controlled manner. Make life at home and in the office more comfortable as you consume clean water everyday from Jumia water dispensers and stay healthy. On Jumia you can buy water dispenser in Nigeria from top brands like Binatone, Linsan, Scanfrost, CWAY, Midea, AKAI, Kent, LG water dispenser and more, they can either be used for domestic or commercial use which makes a very versatile product to purchase from Jumia without any hassle.
markdown:
# Buy Water Dispensers Online in Nigeria

## Where to Buy Water Dispensers Online in Nigeria

Water dispensers are mostly made in a freestanding design generally involves bottles of water placed spout-down into the dispensing machine, there is also the wall mounted kind of water dispenser. Table top water dispenser or kitchen worktop versions are available which utilize readily available five litre water bottles. These **water coolers** use air pumps to push the water into the cooling compartment and Peltier devices to chill the water. A new development is the advent of countertop appliances which are connected to the mains and provide an instant supply of not only chilled water but also hot water. This saves you the stress of filling little bottles with water to get chilled in the [refrigerator](http://www.jumia.com.ng/appliances-fridges/) as the manual water dispenser for home is way more economical and convenient to use. If you are short of space in your home or office, our Mini Water Dispensers are just perfect for you.

### Water Dispensers on Jumia

The **water dispenser machine** is efficiently used with its specially made bottle which comes separately in purchase, just the way it is done on Jumia and it gets delivered to you at your doorstep. How is this water bottle used? the bottle is tipped upside down and set onto the dispenser, a probe punctures the cap of the bottle and allows the water to flow into the machine's internal reservoir. These gravity-powered systems have a device to dispense water in a controlled manner. Make life at home and in the office more comfortable as you consume clean water everyday from Jumia water dispensers and stay healthy. On Jumia you can buy water dispenser in Nigeria from top brands like Binatone, Linsan, Scanfrost, CWAY, Midea, AKAI, Kent, LG water dispenser and more, they can either be used for domestic or commercial use which makes a very versatile product to purchase from Jumia without any hassle.

Home & Office Appliances - Jumia Nigeria 
Home & Office Appliances That Make Life Easier – Shop on Jumia Nigeria
In today’s fast-paced world, comfort and convenience are no longer a luxury—they're a necessity. Whether you’re working remotely, raising a family, or simply creating your dream living space, having the right home and office appliances can completely transform your daily routine. At Jumia Nigeria, we make it easy for you to equip your home and workspace with essential appliances that blend functionality, style, and Nigerian lifestyle.
From energy-efficient refrigerators to high-performance fans, blenders, and washing machines, our Home & Office Appliances category is tailored to suit every household and workplace need—whether you live in bustling Lagos or serene Jos.
As more Nigerians adopt hybrid lifestyles where home and office is home, our range ensures that your environment stays productive, organized, and enjoyable.
Explore More in the Home & Office Universe
Home & Office Main Category: Dive into a world of solutions designed to make home living and office working more efficient and enjoyable.
Home Furniture: Complete your space with sofas, work desks, wardrobes, and dining tables that suit both traditional Nigerian homes and modern apartments.
Home & Kitchen: Cook and serve your favourite dishes—like efo riro or egusi soup—with the right utensils and kitchenware that help you enjoy every mealtime.
Office Products: Stock up on stationery, printers, and office chairs for an organized, productive workspace—at home or in the office.
Tools & Home Improvement: Take care of small repairs or major upgrades with our range of hand tools, lighting, and electrical fittings—perfect for the DIY enthusiast.
Why Choose Jumia Nigeria for Home & Office Appliances?
Variety for Every Budget: Whether you’re furnishing a full apartment or just need one appliance, we’ve got options for everyone.
Trusted Brands: Buy from reliable names you know and love.
Fast Delivery Across Nigeria: From Abuja to Port Harcourt, get what you need, when you need it.
Safe Payments & Easy Returns: Enjoy peace of mind with every order.
Ready to Upgrade Your Home & Office Life?
Don’t wait—shop our Home & Office Appliances now and experience how small upgrades can make a big difference. Whether you're looking to cool down, cook faster, or clean smarter, Jumia Nigeria is your go-to destination for comfort, productivity, and a touch of Naija flair.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
What are the most essential home and office appliances in Nigeria?
Some of the most essential appliances include air conditioners, standing fans, microwave ovens, washing machines, and electric kettles. These items help manage daily chores while improving comfort and productivity, especially when working from home.
How do I choose the best appliances for a small home office setup?
Look for compact and energy-efficient devices such as table fans, mini fridges, and all-in-one printers. These save space and keep your work area tidy without sacrificing functionality.
Can I buy affordable home and office appliances online in Nigeria?
Absolutely. Jumia Nigeria offers competitive pricing on a wide range of appliances. Plus, you can take advantage of special sales events like Black Friday and Tech Week to get even better deals.
What are the best appliances for hot weather in Nigeria?
During hot seasons, cooling appliances like air conditioners, ceiling fans, and water dispensers are essential. These are available in multiple sizes and energy ratings to fit both homes and offices.
Where can I find appliances that are energy-efficient and durable in Nigeria?
Jumia Nigeria partners with reputable brands that focus on energy-saving and long-lasting products. Each listing includes specs and customer reviews to help you choose the right option for your needs.
markdown:
# Home Appliances - Shop The Latest Deals On Appliances

  Home & Office Appliances - Jumia Nigeria

## **Home & Office Appliances That Make Life Easier – Shop on Jumia Nigeria**

In today’s fast-paced world, comfort and convenience are no longer a luxury—they're a necessity. Whether you’re working remotely, raising a family, or simply creating your dream living space, having the right **home and office appliances** can completely transform your daily routine. At **Jumia Nigeria**, we make it easy for you to equip your home and workspace with essential appliances that blend functionality, style, and Nigerian lifestyle.

From energy-efficient refrigerators to high-performance fans, blenders, and washing machines, our Home & Office Appliances category is tailored to suit every household and workplace need—whether you live in bustling Lagos or serene Jos.

As more Nigerians adopt hybrid lifestyles where _home and office is home_, our range ensures that your environment stays productive, organized, and enjoyable.

## **Explore More in the Home & Office Universe**

*   [Home & Office Main Category](https://www.jumia.com.ng/home-office/): Dive into a world of solutions designed to make home living and office working more efficient and enjoyable.
*   [Home Furniture](https://www.jumia.com.ng/home-furniture/): Complete your space with sofas, work desks, wardrobes, and dining tables that suit both traditional Nigerian homes and modern apartments.
*   [Home & Kitchen](https://www.jumia.com.ng/home-kitchen/): Cook and serve your favourite dishes—like efo riro or egusi soup—with the right utensils and kitchenware that help you enjoy every mealtime.
*   [Office Products](https://www.jumia.com.ng/office-products/): Stock up on stationery, printers, and office chairs for an organized, productive workspace—at home or in the office.
*   [Tools & Home Improvement](https://www.jumia.com.ng/tools-home-improvement/): Take care of small repairs or major upgrades with our range of hand tools, lighting, and electrical fittings—perfect for the DIY enthusiast.

## **Why Choose Jumia Nigeria for Home & Office Appliances?**

*   **Variety for Every Budget:** Whether you’re furnishing a full apartment or just need one appliance, we’ve got options for everyone.
*   **Trusted Brands:** Buy from reliable names you know and love.
*   **Fast Delivery Across Nigeria:** From Abuja to Port Harcourt, get what you need, when you need it.
*   **Safe Payments & Easy Returns:** Enjoy peace of mind with every order.

## **Ready to Upgrade Your Home & Office Life?**

Don’t wait—**shop our Home & Office Appliances now** and experience how small upgrades can make a _big difference_. Whether you're looking to cool down, cook faster, or clean smarter, Jumia Nigeria is your go-to destination for comfort, productivity, and a touch of Naija flair.

## **Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)**

**What are the most essential home and office appliances in Nigeria?**  
Some of the most essential appliances include air conditioners, standing fans, microwave ovens, washing machines, and electric kettles. These items help manage daily chores while improving comfort and productivity, especially when working from home.

**How do I choose the best appliances for a small home office setup?**  
Look for compact and energy-efficient devices such as table fans, mini fridges, and all-in-one printers. These save space and keep your work area tidy without sacrificing functionality.

**Can I buy affordable home and office appliances online in Nigeria?**  
Absolutely. Jumia Nigeria offers competitive pricing on a wide range of appliances. Plus, you can take advantage of special sales events like Black Friday and Tech Week to get even better deals.

**What are the best appliances for hot weather in Nigeria?**  
During hot seasons, cooling appliances like air conditioners, ceiling fans, and water dispensers are essential. These are available in multiple sizes and energy ratings to fit both homes and offices.

**Where can I find appliances that are energy-efficient and durable in Nigeria?**  
Jumia Nigeria partners with reputable brands that focus on energy-saving and long-lasting products. Each listing includes specs and customer reviews to help you choose the right option for your needs.

text:
Buy Phones, Tablets, and Phone Accessories at Affordable Prices Online
Shop Everything Phones, Tablets, and Phone Accessories on Jumia Nigeria!
Buy the Best Phones and Tablets at the Lowest Prices
Smartphones and tablets have become an integral part of our everyday lives. These gadgets have transcended basic cellphones communication to offer limitless abilities. In today’s world, a phone can be a camera, a scanner, and even an assistant, thanks to the advancement of artificial intelligence (AI). At Jumia Nigeria, the country's #1 online shopping mall, we offer a wide range of top cellphones, smartphones, tablets, and phone accessories from leading brands like Samsung, Tecno, Apple, Oraimo, Infinix, Lenovo, Oppo, Xiaomi, and Fitbit. Our website's filter makes it easy to narrow down your search and find the device that best suits your needs. Whether you're looking to upgrade your device or buy the best accessories like phone cases and wireless devices, we've got you covered.
We offer a variety of cellphones , from torchlight phones with dual SIM to advanced devices featuring 5G mobile, OLED displays, LCD screens, face ID, multiple cameras, and more! These devices operate on various systems like Android, iOS, or Windows. Brands like Samsung and Tecno run on Android, iOS is exclusive to the iPhone and iPad, while tablets like the Microsoft Surface Pro and Asus Vivobook operate on Windows. Many of these devices have sleek designs that are sure to catch your eye. Explore them on Jumia Nigeria at the best prices, with huge discounts, fast delivery, and a flexible free returns policy.
Enjoy Huge Discounts on All Phones and Tablets
Save time and effort by shopping online. Quality is guaranteed as you are buying from the official stores of your favorite brands. Newly released phones like the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, Tecno Pop 7 Pro, Xiaomi Redmi Note 12, Itel A60, and Xiaomi Redmi 12C are available on Jumia Nigeria. Thanks to the latest cutting-edge technology, we now have foldable phones that can unfold into a tablet, like the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4, or fold into smaller sizes like the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4. How amazing! The iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad Pro, and iPad Air are still the latest Apple devices in the market, and if you love the classic iPhone 12 Pro, we have it all.
On a Budget? Check Out These Low-Budget Phones
We have all kinds of smartphones for every budget. Explore affordable options like refurbished triple camera iPhone 11 Pro Max, budget-friendly Samsung phones, and other Android phones in the mid to low-budget range like the Samsung Galaxy A14, Itel A60, Xiaomi Redmi Note 11, Vivo Y20, Infinix Smart 6, and many others! Smartphones make our lives easier as we can access our email, browse the internet, and capture high-quality photos with amazing camera specs. You can explore other cheap phones from brands like Tecno, Lenovo, and HTC.
Find the Best Deals on Tablets and Accessories
Finding the best deals on tablets is a breeze with Jumia Nigeria. Whether you want a tablet for reading, watching movies, or gaming, we have it all! Explore deals on popular tablets from brands like Apple iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Huawei MatePad, and many others!
Don’t miss out on our selection of phone accessories including phone covers, power banks, wireless chargers, and protective screen guards. Accessories enhance the functionality and durability of your devices. Get yours now on Jumia Nigeria and enjoy free delivery and easy returns! With our user-friendly website, you can easily find what you need. Shop for the latest gadgets, compare prices, and take advantage of exciting discounts today! Whether you're looking for smartphones, tablets, or phone accessories, we have everything you need in one place.
Pay For Your Orders With JumiaPay
Pay for your orders faster with JumiaPay. You can pay with MasterCard, Visa card, USSD, or bank transfer. It is faster, safer, and more convenient. If you get your order delivered to you and need to return it, do not worry, we have a flexible free returns policy that allows for returning your order and you will get a refund. Keep enjoying our huge discounts and free delivery on many mobile phone orders.
What to Consider When Buying Phones and Tablets Online?
When purchasing phones and tablets online, it's important to consider factors such as:
Brand and Model: Popular brands like Infinix, Samsung, Tecno, and Lenovo have a wide range of models.
Price and Budget: Look for deals and discounts on Jumia to find cheap phones and tablets that fit your budget.
Features and Specifications: Consider what features are most important to you, such as battery life, camera quality, and storage capacity.
Reviews and Ratings: Check customer reviews and ratings for insights into the product's performance and reliability.
Why Choose Jumia Nigeria?
Shopping on Jumia Nigeria means you are getting the best deals, a wide variety of products, and excellent customer service. Our easy-to-navigate website and detailed product descriptions make shopping a hassle-free experience. Enjoy secure payments, fast delivery, and a hassle-free return policy. We strive to make your online shopping experience enjoyable and efficient. Shop now and see why Jumia is Nigeria’s top online shopping destination!
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Phones and Tablets
How do I know if this phone/tablet will work with my network provider?
All phones and tablets listed on Jumia Nigeria specify their network compatibility in the product details section. Please check the "Network" section to ensure the device supports your carrier's frequencies. If you are unsure, you can contact your network provider with the model number to confirm compatibility.
What is the warranty and return policy for phones and tablets purchased on Jumia Nigeria?
All phones and tablets sold on Jumia Nigeria come with a manufacturer warranty, typically ranging from 1 to 2 years. Our return policy allows you to return the product within 7 days if it is faulty or does not meet your expectations. Please refer to our Return Policy page for detailed information on how to process a return.
Can I trust the quality and authenticity of phones and tablets sold on Jumia Nigeria?
Jumia Nigeria partners directly with reputable manufacturers and authorized distributors to ensure that all phones and tablets are 100% genuine and of high quality. Additionally, we have a strict quality control process in place to verify the authenticity of all products listed on our platform.
What should I look for in terms of specifications when choosing a new phone or tablet?
When selecting a new phone or tablet, consider the following key specifications:
Processor: Determines the device's speed and performance.
RAM: Affects multitasking capabilities.
Storage: Ensure you have enough space for apps, photos, and files.
Battery Life: Check the battery capacity for long-lasting use.
Camera Quality: Look for high megapixel counts and additional features like night mode.
Screen Resolution: Higher resolution provides a clearer and sharper display.
How do I transfer my data from my old device to a new phone or tablet?
Transferring data is easy with various available methods:
Cloud Services: Use services like Google Drive, iCloud, or OneDrive to back up and transfer your data.
Manufacturer Tools: Many brands offer dedicated apps (e.g., Samsung Smart Switch, Apple iCloud) for seamless data transfer.
Manual Transfer: Use a computer to copy and transfer files via USB.
What should I consider regarding the operating system (OS) when buying a new device?
Consider your familiarity with the OS, the app ecosystem, and the device's future software update support:
Android: Offers customization, a wide range of device options, and access to Google services.
iOS: Known for its user-friendly interface, seamless integration with other Apple products, and timely updates.
Are there any financing options available for purchasing phones and tablets on Jumia Nigeria?
Yes, Jumia Nigeria offers various financing options to make purchasing phones and tablets more affordable. You can opt for installment payment plans through our partner financial institutions. Simply select the financing option at checkout to see the available plans and choose the one that best suits your budget.
Explore More Categories
Phone Cases
Battery Chargers 
Screen Protectors
Power Banks
Bluetooth Earbuds
Iphone XR
Conclusion
At Jumia Nigeria, we bring the latest phones, tablets, and accessories right to your fingertips with unmatched convenience and value. Whether you're in bustling Lagos, vibrant Abuja, or any corner of Nigeria, we offer you access to the finest gadgets from top brands like Samsung, Tecno, and Apple at unbeatable prices. Our user-friendly website makes shopping effortless, with fast delivery across major cities and beyond.
Discover the newest innovations in smartphones and tablets, from sleek foldable devices to budget-friendly options that fit any need. Explore our extensive range of accessories to enhance your tech experience, all while enjoying free delivery and easy returns.
Join the thousands of satisfied customers across Nigeria who trust Jumia for their tech needs. Shop today and see why Jumia Nigeria is the leading online shopping destination for phones, tablets, and more. Get ready to experience top-notch service and incredible deals tailored just for you!

Newly released phones like the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra, Tecno Pop 7 Pro, Xiaomi Redmi Note 12, Itel A60, and Xiaomi Redmi 12C are available on Jumia Nigeria. Thanks to the latest cutting-edge technology, we now have foldable phones that can unfold into a tablet, like the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4, or fold into smaller sizes like the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 4. How amazing! The iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad Pro, and iPad Air are still the latest Apple devices in the market, and if you love the classic iPhone 12 Pro, we have it all.

## **On a Budget? Check Out These Low-Budget Phones**

We have all kinds of smartphones for every budget. Explore affordable options like refurbished triple camera iPhone 11 Pro Max, budget-friendly Samsung phones, and other Android phones in the mid to low-budget range like the Samsung Galaxy A14, Itel A60, Xiaomi Redmi Note 11, Vivo Y20, Infinix Smart 6, and many others! [Smartphones](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phones/) make our lives easier as we can access our email, browse the internet, and capture high-quality photos with amazing camera specs. You can explore other cheap phones from brands like Tecno, Lenovo, and HTC.

## **Find the Best Deals on Tablets and Accessories**

Finding the best deals on tablets is a breeze with Jumia Nigeria. Whether you want a tablet for reading, watching movies, or gaming, we have it all! Explore deals on popular tablets from brands like Apple iPad, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Huawei MatePad, and many others!

Don’t miss out on our selection of [phone accessories](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-accessories/) including phone covers, [power banks](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phone-batteries-battery-packs/), wireless chargers, and protective screen guards. Accessories enhance the functionality and durability of your devices. Get yours now on Jumia Nigeria and enjoy free delivery and easy returns! With our user-friendly website, you can easily find what you need. Shop for the latest gadgets, compare prices, and take advantage of exciting discounts today! Whether you're looking for smartphones, [tablets](https://www.jumia.com.ng/tablets/), or phone accessories, we have everything you need in one place.

## **Pay For Your Orders With JumiaPay**

Pay for your orders faster with JumiaPay. You can pay with MasterCard, Visa card, USSD, or bank transfer. It is faster, safer, and more convenient. If you get your order delivered to you and need to return it, do not worry, we have a flexible free returns policy that allows for returning your order and you will get a refund. Keep enjoying our huge discounts and free delivery on many mobile phone orders.

## **What to Consider When Buying Phones and Tablets Online?**

When purchasing phones and tablets online, it's important to consider factors such as:

*   **Brand and Model:** Popular brands like Infinix, Samsung, Tecno, and Lenovo have a wide range of models.
*   **Price and Budget:** Look for deals and discounts on Jumia to find cheap phones and tablets that fit your budget.
*   **Features and Specifications:** Consider what features are most important to you, such as battery life, camera quality, and storage capacity.
*   **Reviews and Ratings:** Check customer reviews and ratings for insights into the product's performance and reliability.

## **Why Choose Jumia Nigeria?**

Shopping on Jumia Nigeria means you are getting the best deals, a wide variety of products, and excellent customer service. Our easy-to-navigate website and detailed product descriptions make shopping a hassle-free experience. Enjoy secure payments, fast delivery, and a hassle-free return policy. We strive to make your online shopping experience enjoyable and efficient. Shop now and see why Jumia is Nigeria’s top online shopping destination!

## **Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Phones and Tablets**

### **How do I know if this phone/tablet will work with my network provider?**

All phones and tablets listed on Jumia Nigeria specify their network compatibility in the product details section. Please check the "Network" section to ensure the device supports your carrier's frequencies. If you are unsure, you can contact your network provider with the model number to confirm compatibility.

### **What is the warranty and return policy for phones and tablets purchased on Jumia Nigeria?**

All phones and tablets sold on Jumia Nigeria come with a manufacturer warranty, typically ranging from 1 to 2 years. Our return policy allows you to return the product within 7 days if it is faulty or does not meet your expectations. Please refer to our Return Policy page for detailed information on how to process a return.

### **Can I trust the quality and authenticity of phones and tablets sold on Jumia Nigeria?**

Jumia Nigeria partners directly with reputable manufacturers and authorized distributors to ensure that all phones and tablets are 100% genuine and of high quality. Additionally, we have a strict quality control process in place to verify the authenticity of all products listed on our platform.

### **What should I look for in terms of specifications when choosing a new phone or tablet?**

When selecting a new phone or tablet, consider the following key specifications:

*   **Processor:** Determines the device's speed and performance.
*   **RAM:** Affects multitasking capabilities.
*   **Storage:** Ensure you have enough space for apps, photos, and files.
*   **Battery Life:** Check the battery capacity for long-lasting use.
*   **Camera Quality:** Look for high megapixel counts and additional features like night mode.
*   **Screen Resolution:** Higher resolution provides a clearer and sharper display.

### **How do I transfer my data from my old device to a new phone or tablet?**

Transferring data is easy with various available methods:

*   **Cloud Services:** Use services like Google Drive, iCloud, or OneDrive to back up and transfer your data.
*   **Manufacturer Tools:** Many brands offer dedicated apps (e.g., Samsung Smart Switch, Apple iCloud) for seamless data transfer.
*   **Manual Transfer:** Use a computer to copy and transfer files via USB.

### **What should I consider regarding the operating system (OS) when buying a new device?**

Consider your familiarity with the OS, the app ecosystem, and the device's future software update support:

*   **Android:** Offers customization, a wide range of device options, and access to Google services.
*   **iOS:** Known for its user-friendly interface, seamless integration with other Apple products, and timely updates.

### **Are there any financing options available for purchasing phones and tablets on Jumia Nigeria?**

Yes, Jumia Nigeria offers various financing options to make purchasing phones and tablets more affordable. You can opt for installment payment plans through our partner financial institutions. Simply select the financing option at checkout to see the available plans and choose the one that best suits your budget.

## **Explore More Categories**

*   [Phone Cases](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phone-cases-covers/)
*   [Battery Chargers](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phone-battery-chargers/)
*   [Screen Protectors](https://www.jumia.com.ng/tablet-screen-protectors/)
*   [Power Banks](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phone-batteries-battery-packs/)
*   [Bluetooth Earbuds](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mobile-phone-headsets/)
*   [Iphone XR](https://www.jumia.com.ng/mlp-iphone-xr/)

## **Conclusion**

At Jumia Nigeria, we bring the latest phones, tablets, and accessories right to your fingertips with unmatched convenience and value. Whether you're in bustling Lagos, vibrant Abuja, or any corner of Nigeria, we offer you access to the finest gadgets from top brands like Samsung, Tecno, and Apple at unbeatable prices. Our user-friendly website makes shopping effortless, with fast delivery across major cities and beyond.

Discover the newest innovations in smartphones and tablets, from sleek foldable devices to budget-friendly options that fit any need. Explore our extensive range of accessories to enhance your tech experience, all while enjoying free delivery and easy returns.

Join the thousands of satisfied customers across Nigeria who trust Jumia for their tech needs. Shop today and see why Jumia Nigeria is the leading online shopping destination for phones, tablets, and more. Get ready to experience top-notch service and incredible deals tailored just for you!

text:
Help Center | Jumia NG
Payments
What payment methods are accepted on Jumia?
We accept a variety of payment methods including:
• Pay on Delivery allows for payment in cash, or with a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard upon delivery.
• JumiaPay accepts payment through Mastercard, Visa cards, and bank transfers.
• Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL) allows you to buy now and pay later with convenient options such as; Easy Buy and Credpal at checkout.
• Mobile Money enjoy the convenience of paying with or without your wallet using options like Opay and PalmPay at checkout.
• Vouchers allow you to pay using a voucher code.
Payments
How secure is my payment information on Jumia?
Jumia prioritizes customer payment security with encryption, and secure servers. Regular monitoring and auditing are also performed to maintain a secure environment for transactions.
Payments
What do I do if my payment is declined?
If your payment is declined, you can check the following to resolve the issue:
• Check the spelling and billing information you entered for accuracy.
• Ensure that your credit card has sufficient funds or that your bank account has enough balance.
• Check if there are any restrictions on your card, such as a daily spending limit.
• Make sure your card has not expired.
If you've checked the above and your payment is still declined, you can contact Jumia customer service for assistance via our livechat.
Note: It is recommended to keep the details of the error message that appears during the declined transaction to provide to Jumia customer service for a faster resolution.
Payments
Can I pay cash on delivery for my orders?
Yes, you can pay for your orders in cash upon delivery on Jumia. You can choose to pay in cash or opt for other payment options such as a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard payment - all without the need to enter payment information beforehand.
Payments
What should I do if I have been charged twice for the same order?
If you have been charged twice for the same order, you can contact Jumia customer service for assistance in resolving the issue. They can be reached through the Live Chat.
Please provide the following information to Jumia customer service when reporting a double charge:
• Your name and email address used to place the order.
• Order number and date of purchase.
• Details of the double charge (amount, date, and transaction number).
Jumia customer service will assist you in resolving the issue and arranging for a refund if applicable.
Payments
How do I know if my payment has been processed successfully?
You can check the status of your payment by following these steps:
Step 1: Go to the "Orders" section in your account dashboard.
Step 2: Find the order in question and check its status. If the payment has been processed successfully, the order status should be "Confirmed."
You will also receive a confirmation email from Jumia after a successful payment. If you do not receive a confirmation email, or if you have any concerns about your payment, you can contact Jumia customer service via our livechat.
Payments
What is Jumia Store Credit? And How can I use it?
You can get Jumia Store Credit as a refund if your refund to the original payment method used for the purchase fails. You can use this store credit to pay for your orders on Jumia, and JumiaPay, subject to certain conditions. To see your available store credit, go to your Jumia account and click on the "ACCOUNT" tab, or log in to JumiaPay to check your balance.
Payments
What is JumiaPay on delivery?
JumiaPay on delivery is a cashless payment option that allows you to pay for your Jumia orders upon delivery. You can pay with your credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard.
To pay with JumiaPay on delivery, simply ask our delivery associate to use JumiaPay as a payment method. Then, you can select your preferred payment method within JumiaPay.
Payments
Can I cancel my order and get a refund after payment has been made?
If the order hasn't been shipped yet, you can cancel your order and get a refund.
Payments
How long does it take for my payment to be processed?
Most payments on Jumia are processed immediately when completed. However, specific processing times may vary depending on the payment method.
To ensure that your payment is processed quickly, we recommend that you double-check all the information before completing the checkout. If you are experiencing an issue with your payment, please contact our customer service team for further assistance.
Payments
How do I pay via bank transfer on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery?
If you prefer to pay using a bank transfer, follow the steps below:
• Upon delivery, kindly request from our delivery associate that you would like to pay with a bank transfer via ''JumiaPay."
• The Delivery associate will generate a link that will be sent to you via SMS on your registered phone number.
• Click on the link, and it will redirect you to the JumiaPay app page with the bank account details.
• Kindly ensure you transfer the EXACT AMOUNT to the JumiaPay account provided.
• Confirm that your payment was successful.
A unique or different bank account is provided for each transaction; do not keep the account information for future usage.
Please note: Do not share your card details or CVV with the delivery associate.
Payments
How do I pay with my card on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery? 
If you prefer to pay using card, follow the steps below:
• The Delivery associate will send a JumiaPay payment link to your registered phone number on the order, or better still, you can scan the QR code to get the payment link. 
• Click on the link, provide your card details to pay or simply log into your account to pay with your card stored on JumiaPay. 
• Confirm that your payment was successful. 
That is it! You’re done.
Please note: Do not share your card details or CVV with the delivery associate.
Payments
How do I pay via USSD on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery?
If you prefer to pay via USSD, kindly follow the steps below:
• Upon delivery, kindly request from our delivery associate that you would like to pay via ''JumiaPay."
• The Delivery associate will generate a link that will be sent to you via SMS on your registered phone number.
• Click on the link, and it will redirect you to the JumiaPay app page with the bank account details.
• Kindly ensure you pay the EXACT AMOUNT to the JumiaPay account provided using your bank's USSD code.
• Confirm that your payment was successful.
For further inquiry/feedback write to us at jumiapay.feedback.ng@jumia.com. 
Payments
How long does it take for my payment to be processed?
Most payments on Jumia are processed immediately when completed. However, specific processing times may vary depending on the payment method.
To ensure that your payment is processed quickly, we recommend that you double-check all the information before completing the checkout. If you are experiencing an issue with your payment, please contact Jumia's customer service team for assistance.
markdown:
# Help Center | Jumia NG

Payments

What payment methods are accepted on Jumia?

We accept a variety of payment methods including:

• **Pay on Delivery** allows for payment in cash, or with a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard upon delivery.

• **JumiaPay** accepts payment through Mastercard, Visa cards, and bank transfers.

• **Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL)** allows you to buy now and pay later with convenient options such as; Easy Buy and Credpal at checkout.

**• Mobile Money** enjoy the convenience of paying with or without your wallet using options like Opay and PalmPay at checkout.

• **Vouchers** allow you to pay using a voucher code.

Payments

How secure is my payment information on Jumia?

Jumia prioritizes customer payment security with encryption, and secure servers. Regular monitoring and auditing are also performed to maintain a secure environment for transactions.

Payments

What do I do if my payment is declined?

If your payment is declined, you can check the following to resolve the issue:

• Check the  **spelling and billing information** you entered for accuracy.

• Ensure that your credit card has **sufficient funds** or that your bank account has enough balance.

• Check if there are any **restrictions on your card**, such as a daily spending limit.

• Make sure your card has **not expired**.

If you've checked the above and your payment is still declined, you can contact Jumia customer service for assistance via our livechat.

**Note:** It is recommended to keep the details of the error message that appears during the declined transaction to provide to Jumia customer service for a faster resolution.

Payments

Can I pay cash on delivery for my orders?

Yes, you can pay for your orders in cash upon delivery on Jumia. You can choose to pay in cash or opt for other payment options such as a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard payment - all without the need to enter payment information beforehand.

Payments

What should I do if I have been charged twice for the same order?

If you have been charged twice for the same order, you can contact Jumia customer service for assistance in resolving the issue. They can be reached through the Live Chat.

Please provide the following information to Jumia customer service when reporting a double charge:

• Your name and email address used to place the order.

• Order number and date of purchase.

• Details of the double charge (amount, date, and transaction number).

Jumia customer service will assist you in resolving the issue and arranging for a refund if applicable.

Payments

How do I know if my payment has been processed successfully?

You can check the status of your payment by following these steps:

**Step 1**: Go to the "[Orders](https://www.jumia.com.ng/customer/order/index/)" section in your account dashboard.

**Step 2**: Find the order in question and check its status. If the payment has been processed successfully, the order status should be "**Confirmed**."

You will also receive a confirmation email from Jumia after a successful payment. If you do not receive a confirmation email, or if you have any concerns about your payment, you can contact Jumia customer service via our livechat.

Payments

What is Jumia Store Credit? And How can I use it?

You can get Jumia Store Credit as a refund if your refund to the original payment method used for the purchase fails. You can use this store credit to pay for your orders on Jumia, and JumiaPay, subject to certain conditions. To see your available store credit, go to your Jumia account and click on the "[ACCOUNT](https://www.jumia.com.ng/customer/account/index/)" tab, or log in to JumiaPay to check your balance.

Payments

What is JumiaPay on delivery?

JumiaPay on delivery is a cashless payment option that allows you to pay for your Jumia orders upon delivery. You can pay with your credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard.

To pay with JumiaPay on delivery, simply ask our delivery associate to use JumiaPay as a payment method. Then, you can select your preferred payment method within JumiaPay.

Payments

Can I cancel my order and get a refund after payment has been made?

If the order hasn't been shipped yet, **you can cancel your order and get a refund.**

Payments

How long does it take for my payment to be processed?

Most payments on Jumia are processed immediately when completed. However, specific processing times may vary depending on the payment method.

To ensure that your payment is processed quickly, we recommend that you double-check all the information before completing the checkout. If you are experiencing an issue with your payment, please contact our customer service team for further assistance.

Payments

How do I pay via bank transfer on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery?

If you prefer to pay using a bank transfer, follow the steps below:

• Upon delivery, kindly request from our delivery associate that you would like to pay with a bank transfer via ''JumiaPay."

• The Delivery associate will generate a link that will be sent to you via SMS on your registered phone number.

• Click on the link, and it will redirect you to the JumiaPay app page with the bank account details.

• Kindly ensure you transfer the **EXACT AMOUNT** to the JumiaPay account provided.

• Confirm that your payment was successful.

A unique or different bank account is provided for each transaction; do not keep the account information for future usage.

**Please note:** Do not share your card details or CVV with the delivery associate.

Payments

How do I pay with my card on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery?

If you prefer to pay using card, follow the steps below:

• The Delivery associate will send a JumiaPay payment link to your registered phone number on the order, or better still, you can scan the QR code to get the payment link. 

• Click on the link, provide your card details to pay or simply log into your account to pay with your card stored on JumiaPay. 

• Confirm that your payment was successful. 

That is it! You’re done.

**Please note**: Do not share your card details or CVV with the delivery associate.

Payments

How do I pay via USSD on delivery via JumiaPay on delivery?

If you prefer to pay via USSD, kindly follow the steps below:

• Upon delivery, kindly request from our delivery associate that you would like to pay via ''JumiaPay."

• The Delivery associate will generate a link that will be sent to you via SMS on your registered phone number.

• Click on the link, and it will redirect you to the JumiaPay app page with the bank account details.

• Kindly ensure you pay the EXACT AMOUNT to the JumiaPay account provided using your bank's USSD code.

• Confirm that your payment was successful.

For further inquiry/feedback write to us at **jumiapay.feedback.ng@jumia.com**. 

Payments

How long does it take for my payment to be processed?

Most payments on Jumia are processed immediately when completed. However, specific processing times may vary depending on the payment method.

To ensure that your payment is processed quickly, we recommend that you double-check all the information before completing the checkout. If you are experiencing an issue with your payment, please contact Jumia's customer service team for assistance.

Help Center | Jumia NG
How to place an order
Place an order in a few simple steps:
Step 1: Browse and choose your product
• Browse the JUMIA WEBSITE or use the search bar to find the product you want to order.
• Click on the product to view more information and details.
Step 2: Add your product to your cart.
• Review the product content and Click on the “Add to Cart” button 
• Select the desired quantity of the product in your cart and proceed to checkout.
Step 3: Complete the checkout
• Fill in your delivery address and choose your preferred delivery method.
• Review your order information and click on the “Confirm Delivery Details” button.
Step 4: Select your payment method and pay for your order
• Select your preferred payment method
• Click on " Confirm Payment Method" and complete the payment process.
Step 5: Review your order summary 
• Check all order details, quantity, amount and click on " Confirm Order".
• Once your order is placed, a unique order number is generated, which can be used to track your order. 
Note: To ensure a smooth order process, please ensure to provide accurate and complete delivery information and choose a payment method that is available in your location.
We hope this guide has been helpful. Happy shopping

# Help Center | Jumia NG

## How to place an order

Place an order in a few simple steps:

**Step 1: Browse and choose your product**  
• Browse the **[JUMIA WEBSITE](https://www.jumia.com.ng/)** or use the search bar to find the product you want to order.  
• Click on the product to view more information and details.

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Place_your_order/place_order1.png)

**Step 2: Add your product to your cart.**  
• Review the product content and  Click on the “Add to Cart” button   
• Select the desired quantity of the product in your cart and proceed to checkout.

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-cxp-all/2023/PLACE_ORDER/2024/step-2.png)

**![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-cxp-all/2023/PLACE_ORDER/2024/step-3.png)**

**Step 3: Complete the checkout**  
• Fill in your delivery address and choose your preferred delivery method.  
• Review your order information and click on the “Confirm Delivery Details” button.

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-cxp-all/2023/PLACE_ORDER/2024/step-4.png)

**Step 4: Select your payment method and pay for your order**  
• Select your preferred payment method  
• Click on " Confirm Payment Method"  and complete the payment process.

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Place_your_order/place_order_8.png)

**Step 5: Review your order summary**   
• Check all order details, quantity, amount and click on " Confirm Order".

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Place_your_order/place_order_9.png)

• Once your order is placed, a unique order number is generated, which can be used to track your order.  

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-cxp-all/2023/PLACE_ORDER/2024/step-7.png)

**Note:** To ensure a smooth order process, please ensure to provide accurate and complete delivery information and choose a payment method that is available in your location.

We hope this guide has been helpful. Happy shopping

text:
Help Center | Jumia NG
How to pay for your order
Jumia offers multiple payment options. Pay for the item Online (JumiaPay/BNPL) or on delivery by using your card, bank transfer, or USSD via our JumiaPay secure platform. You can also pay for your order using a voucher.
Option 1: Pay On Delivery
You can pay for your orders upon delivery in a variety of ways to accommodate your needs. Choose to pay in cash, or opt for a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard payment.
Option 2: JumiaPay
You can securely pay for your order on Jumia using Mastercard, Visa, or Verve cards, as well as bank transfer, or card payment.
Option 3: Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL)
Did you know you can buy now and pay later using our convenient payment options? Take advantage of Easy Buy or Credpal at checkout. For more information, visit this link.
Option 4: Mobile Money
You can effortlessly pay for your orders using Opay or PalmPay at checkout, ensuring a smooth and worry-free experience. 
For more information, visit this link.
Option 5: Vouchers
You can pay for your orders using a voucher code. Click here for a guide on how to use a voucher code
Choose the payment option that works best for you for a hassle-free shopping experience.
Paying for Your Jumia Order - A Step by Step Guide
Step 1: Select the item of your choice and proceed to click on checkout.
Step 2: Choose your payment method
Step 3: Complete your payment
a. Jumia pay
b. Easy Buy or CredPal
c. Opay or Palmpay
For payment upon delivery, including cash on delivery, credit/debit card payment, and bank transfer, simply wait for your order to be delivered and choose your preferred payment method. 
• To pay with a voucher code for your order, follow the steps below: 
- Add items to your cart and proceed to the "Checkout Page." 
- Enter your voucher code in the " Voucher" field under the "Payment Method" section. 
- Apply the voucher by clicking "Add Voucher." 
Step 4: Confirm your payment
Once your payment is complete, you will receive an order confirmation email.
• If you've chosen online payment, the payment confirmation page will also display your payment details.
If you experience any issues with payment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team. We are here to help you and make sure that your Jumia shopping experience is as smooth as possible.
We hope this guide has been helpful. Happy shopping!
markdown:
# Help Center | Jumia NG

## How to pay for your order

Jumia offers multiple payment options. Pay for the item Online (JumiaPay/BNPL) or on delivery by using your card, bank transfer, or USSD via our JumiaPay secure platform. You can also pay for your order using a voucher.

**Option 1: Pay On Delivery**

You can pay for your orders upon delivery in a variety of ways to accommodate your needs. Choose to pay in cash, or opt for a credit/debit card, bank transfer, or Mastercard payment.

**Option 2: JumiaPay**

You can securely pay for your order on Jumia using Mastercard, Visa, or Verve cards, as well as bank transfer, or card payment.

**Option 3: Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL)**

Did you know you can buy now and pay later using our convenient payment options? Take advantage of Easy Buy or Credpal at checkout. For more information, visit this [link.](https://www.jumia.com.ng/sp-buynowpaylaterfaq/)

**Option 4: Mobile Money**

You can effortlessly pay for your orders using Opay or PalmPay at checkout, ensuring a smooth and worry-free experience. 

For more information, visit this [link](https://www.jumia.com.ng/sp-mobile-money/).

**Option 5: Vouchers**

You can pay for your orders using a voucher code. Click [here](https://www.jumia.com.ng/sp-use-voucher/) for a guide on how to use a voucher code

Choose the payment option that works best for you for a hassle-free shopping experience.

**Paying for Your Jumia Order - A Step by Step Guide**

**Step 1: Select the item of your choice and proceed to click on checkout.**

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Pay/updated/unnamed.png)

**Step 2: Choose your payment method**

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Pay/Nov_Updated/Payment_2.png)

**Step 3:  Complete your payment**

**a. Jumia pay**

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Pay/updated/unn.png)

 

**b. Easy Buy or CredPal**

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Pay/updated/unn.png)

**c. Opay or Palmpay**

![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2024/Pay/Nov_Updated/Opay.png)

 

For payment upon delivery, including cash on delivery, credit/debit card payment, and bank transfer, simply wait for your order to be delivered and choose your preferred payment method. 

• To pay with a voucher code for your order, follow the steps below: 

 - Add items to your cart and proceed to the "Checkout Page."   
\- Enter your voucher code in the " Voucher" field under the "Payment Method" section.   
\- Apply the voucher by clicking "Add Voucher." 

**Step 4: Confirm your payment**

Once your payment is complete, you will receive an order confirmation email.

**•**  If you've chosen online payment, the payment confirmation page will also display your payment details.

If you experience any issues with payment, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team. We are here to help you and make sure that your Jumia shopping experience is as smooth as possible.

We hope this guide has been helpful. Happy shopping!

Help Center | Jumia NG
To cancel an item or an order

Contact Customer Support on 07006000000 

Note: You can only cancel an item or an order before it is shipped. Once your order has been shipped, it cannot be canceled by our customer service agents. 
If your order was prepaid, please note that the refund processing time may vary depending on the payment method:
• If payment was made by card or bank transfer, your refund will be processed within 24 hours, and it may take 3–10 business days for the refund to reflect in your bank account.
• If payment was made using Jumia store credit, the refund will be credited to your Jumia account as store credit within 24 hours.
• If payment was made with a voucher, your voucher will be reactivated within 24 hours for use.
Thank you for shopping with us.

# Help Center | Jumia NG

**To cancel an item or an order**  
Contact Customer Support on 07006000000  
**  
Note:** You can only cancel an item or an order before it is shipped. Once your order has been shipped, it cannot be canceled by our customer service agents.

If your order was prepaid, please note that the refund processing time may vary depending on the payment method:

• If payment was made by **card or bank transfer**, your refund will be processed within 24 hours, and it may take 3–10 business days for the refund to reflect in your bank account.

• If payment was made using **Jumia store credit**, the refund will be credited to your Jumia account as store credit within 24 hours.

• If payment was made with a **voucher**, your voucher will be reactivated within 24 hours for use.

Thank you for shopping with us.

Help Center | Jumia NG
How to track your order
Tracking your order on Jumia is easy and simple. Here's how to do it:
Step 1: Log in to your account
Step 2: Click on the "ORDERS" tab in your account dashboard.
Step 3: Find the order you want to track and click on "See Details". 
Step 4: On the order details page, click on track my item to view the current status and a complete tracking history.
Alternatively, once your order is shipped, you can also track your order by using your "package number" provided in your shipping email. Simply enter the package number into Jumia's PACKAGE TRACKING PAGE to view the latest updates on your package.
Stay updated on the status of your Jumia order and enjoy a seamless shopping experience by following these simple steps.
Delivery timelines
Business days are Monday to Friday only, excluding weekends and public holidays.
Jumia Express delivery timelines apply to orders placed before 4 PM across all locations. Orders placed after this time will have an additional day added to the delivery timeline.

# Help Center | Jumia NG ## How to track your order Tracking your order on Jumia is easy and simple. Here's how to do it: **Step 1**: Log in to your account ![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2023/place-order/updated/login.png) **Step 2**: Click on the "[ORDERS](https://www.jumia.com.ng/customer/order/index/)" tab in your account dashboard. ![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2023/trackorder/unnamed.png) **Step 3**: Find the order you want to track and click on **"See Details"**.  ![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2023/trackorder/unnamed2.png) **Step 4:** On the order details page, click on track my item to view the current status and a complete tracking history. ![](https://ng.jumia.is/cms/0-1-initiatives/cxp/2023/trackorder/unnamed4.png) Alternatively, once your order is shipped, you can also track your order by using your "**package number"** provided in your shipping email. Simply enter the package number into Jumia's  [**PACKAGE TRACKING PAGE**](https://packagetracker-services.jumia.com/#/) to view the latest updates on your package. Stay updated on the status of your Jumia order and enjoy a seamless shopping experience by following these simple steps. **Delivery timelines** Business days are **Monday to Friday** only, excluding **weekends and public holidays**. Jumia Express delivery timelines apply to orders placed before **4 PM** across all locations. Orders placed after this time will have **an additional day** added to the delivery timeline. | | jumia
